text: Yithi (Muhammad): “Nibajongile phofu abo nibanqulayo ngaphandle koAllâh? Khanindiboniseni abakudalileyo komhlaba: okanye mhlawumbi babe nobuhlulelane (ekudalweni) kwamazulu? Ndiziseleni isibhalo (esatyhilwa) ngaphambili kunesi (i’Kur’ân) okanye intwana (esaseleyo) yolwazi, ukuba nithetha inyaniso.”
